name: Van Sang's Pain
description:
This was originally the GameKit RetroPie (Raspbian OS) version of the game 'Van Sang's Pain' for download to the Raspberry Pi 2 with the flashed RetroPie setup.

This game v1.0 was made as part of the GameKid Raspberry Jam event running from the 13th to 20th September, 2015.

There are updates and other versions for other OSes, see our website for information about that or download here directly.

---

03.10.2015: Updated to v1.1, see the readme.txt for details on what's changed.

04.10.2015: Updated to v1.2, Fixed the sound effect playing lag.

11.10.2015: Windows-x64 version 1.3 available free at our site: http://www.micahkoleoso.de

21.03.2016: Raspberry PI 3 version of v1.3 uploaded. Unpack and see the readme for details how to run and control. You need python 2 and pygame installed on the PI to run this. Probably works on the PI 2 and 1 but untested.

17.03.2017 v1.4: New features are unified python application for various OSes, fullscreen window and gamepad support to specifically enable seamless integration into Retropie's game frontend.

Please note: On v1.4, the full windows mode does not correctly work with DPI scaling in Windows not being set to 100%! Download the v1.5 instead.

19.03.2017 v1.5: This is a Windows only version with DPI awareness for displays scaled lower, equal or higher than 100%.
